009
010package imagingbook.pub.color.edge;
011
012import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
013import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
016import imagingbook.lib.util.ParameterBundle;
017
018/**
019 * Simple grayscale edge detector for color images. The color image
020 * is converted to grayscale for edge detection.
021 * @author W. Burger
022 * @version 2014/02/17
023 */
024public class GrayscaleEdgeDetector extends ColorEdgeDetector {
025        
026
027        final ImageProcessor I;
028        final int M;    // image width
029        final int N;    // image height
030        final Parameters params;
031        
032        final FloatProcessor Emag;      // edge magnitude map
033        final FloatProcessor Eort;      // edge orientation map
034        
035        double wr = 0.2126, wg = 0.7152, wb = 0.0722;   // ITU BR.709 luma weights
036
037        /**
038         * Currently unused, no parameters to set
039         */
040        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
041        }
042        
043        // Sobel-kernels for x/y-derivatives:
044    final float[] HxS = Matrix.multiply(1.0f/8, new float[] {
045                        -1, 0, 1,
046                    -2, 0, 2,
047                    -1, 0, 1
048                    });
049    
050    final float[] HyS = Matrix.multiply(1.0f/8, new float[] {
051                        -1, -2, -1,
052                         0,  0,  0,
053                         1,  2,  1
054                         });
055    
056    final int R = 0, G = 1, B = 2;              // RGB channel indexes
057        
058    private FloatProcessor Ix;
059    private FloatProcessor Iy;
060 
061        public GrayscaleEdgeDetector(ImageProcessor I) {
062                this(I, new Parameters());
063        }
064        
065        public GrayscaleEdgeDetector(ImageProcessor I, Parameters params) {
066                this.params = params;
067                this.I = I;
068                this.M = this.I.getWidth();
069                this.N = this.I.getHeight();
070                Emag = new FloatProcessor(M, N);
071                Eort = new FloatProcessor(M, N);
072                setup();
073                findEdges();
074        }
075        
076        protected void setup() {
077                // convert to a grayscale (float) image with specified RGB weights:
078                if (I instanceof ColorProcessor) {
079                        ((ColorProcessor)I).setRGBWeights(wr, wg, wb);
080                }
081                Ix = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
082                Iy = (FloatProcessor) Ix.duplicate();
083        }
084
085        void findEdges() {
086                Ix.convolve(HxS, 3, 3);
087                Iy.convolve(HyS, 3, 3);
088                
089                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
090                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
091                                // extract the gradients of the R, G, B channels:
092                                final float dx = Ix.getf(u, v); 
093                                final float dy = Iy.getf(u, v);         
094                                
095                                // calculate local edge magnitude:
096                                final float eMag = (float) Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
097                                Emag.setf(u, v, eMag);  
098                                
099                                // calculate edge orientation for the maximum channel:
100                                float eOrt = (float) Math.atan2(dy, dx);
101                                Eort.setf(u, v, eOrt);
102                        }
103                }
104        }
105        
106        public FloatProcessor getEdgeMagnitude() {
107                return Emag;
108        }
109
110        public FloatProcessor getEdgeOrientation() {
111                return Eort;
112        }
113        
114}
